_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Nextcloud
author: Matheusn.biolowons@gmail.com
description:
Nextcloud é uma plataforma de colaboração em nuvem de código aberto que possibilita a criação de servidores de hospedagem de arquivos privados ou empresariais.
Versão: 1.0
Por: Ashu
Check para updates: https://github.com/Ashu11-A/Ashu_eggs

installation.script:
#!/bin/ash
cd /mnt/server
apk --update add git curl file unzip tar autoconf automake git wget
mkdir php-fpm
git clone https://github.com/finnie2006/ptero-nginx ./temp
cp -r ./temp/nginx /mnt/server/
cp -r ./temp/php-fpm /mnt/server/
wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Ashu11-A/Ashu_eggs/main/Nextcloud/start.sh
chmod +x /mnt/server/start.sh
rm -rf ./temp
rm -rf /mnt/server/webroot/*
mkdir logs
rm nginx/conf.d/default.conf
cd nginx/conf.d/
wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Ashu11-A/Ashu_eggs/main/Nextcloud/default.conf
cd /mnt/server
echo "**** download nextcloud ****"
curl -sSL https://download.nextcloud.com/server/releases/nextcloud-${NEXTCLOUD_RELEASE}.tar.bz2 -o nextcloud-${NEXTCLOUD_RELEASE}.tar.bz2
echo "**** test tarball ****"
tar xvf nextcloud-${NEXTCLOUD_RELEASE}.tar.bz2
cat <<EOF > install_log.txt
Versão: ${NEXTCLOUD_RELEASE}
Link: https://download.nextcloud.com/server/releases/nextcloud-${NEXTCLOUD_RELEASE}.tar.bz2
Arquivo: nextcloud-${NEXTCLOUD_RELEASE}.tar.bz2
EOF
chown -R nginx:nginx nextcloud && chmod -R 755 nextcloud
echo "**** cleanup ****"
rm -rf /tmp/*
rm -rf nextcloud-${NEXTCLOUD_RELEASE}.tar.bz2
echo "**** configure php and nginx for nextcloud ****" && \
echo "extension="smbclient.so"" > php-fpm/conf.d/00_smbclient.ini && \
echo 'apc.enable_cli=1' >> php-fpm/conf.d/apcu.ini && \
sed -i \
-e 's/;opcache.enable.*=.*/opcache.enable=1/g' \
-e 's/;opcache.interned_strings_buffer.*=.*/opcache.interned_strings_buffer=16/g' \
-e 's/;opcache.max_accelerated_files.*=.*/opcache.max_accelerated_files=10000/g' \
-e 's/;opcache.memory_consumption.*=.*/opcache.memory_consumption=128/g' \
-e 's/;opcache.save_comments.*=.*/opcache.save_comments=1/g' \
-e 's/;opcache.revalidate_freq.*=.*/opcache.revalidate_freq=1/g' \
-e 's/;always_populate_raw_post_data.*=.*/always_populate_raw_post_data=-1/g' \
-e 's/memory_limit.*=.*128M/memory_limit=512M/g' \
-e 's/max_execution_time.*=.*30/max_execution_time=120/g' \
-e 's/upload_max_filesize.*=.*2M/upload_max_filesize=1024M/g' \
-e 's/post_max_size.*=.*8M/post_max_size=1024M/g' \
-e 's/output_buffering.*=.*/output_buffering=0/g' \
php-fpm/php.ini && \
sed -i \
'/opcache.enable=1/a opcache.enable_cli=1' \
php-fpm/php.ini && \
echo "env[PATH] = /usr/local/bin:/usr/bin:/bin" >> php-fpm/php-fpm.conf
